comments: With leading 0 and offset 3: number of permutations beginning with 4321 and avoiding 1-23. - _Ralf Stephan_, Apr 25 2004
links: S. Kitaev, Generalized pattern avoidance with additional restrictions, Sem. Lothar. Combinat. B48e (2003).
S. Kitaev and T. Mansour, Simultaneous avoidance of generalized patterns.
formula: a(n+1) = Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n+3, k+3)*a(k). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 10 2003With offset 3, e.g.f.: x^3 + exp(exp(x))/6 * int[0..x, t^3*exp(-exp(t)+t) dt]. - _Ralf Stephan_, Apr 25 2004O.g.f. satisfies: A(x) = 1 + x*A( x/(1-x) ) / (1-x)^4. [From Paul D. Hanna, Mar 23 2012]
maple: A045499 := proc(n)    option remember ;    if n =0  then        1 ;    else        add( binomial(n+2,k+3)*procname(k),k=0..n-1) ;    end if;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 03 2014
prog: (PARI) {a(n)=local(A=1+x); for(i=1, n, A=1+x*subst(A, x, x/(1-x+x*O(x^n)))/(1-x)^4); polcoeff(A, n)} /* Paul D. Hanna, Mar 23 2012 */(Python)# The function Gould_diag is defined in A121207.A045499_list = lambda size: Gould_diag(4, size)print(A045499_list(24)) # _Peter Luschny_, Apr 24 2016
author: _Henry Gould_
extensions: Entry revised by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 11 2006
